import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Events.css'; function Events() { const upcomingEvent = { id: 1, title: "Sept Hackathon", description: "Hacjathon about idk in september", image: "./logo2.png", date: "2024-03-15 | ", time: "10:00 AM", }; const pastEvent = { id: 2, title: "Innovation Hackathon", description: "This is a past event", image: "./past-innovation-hackathon.jpg", date: "2023-12-20 | ", time: "2:00 PM", }; return (
